body.content:
Gerald,

i received your email.Please read my email carefully.

you will be receiving your long awaited fund of $10.5M but the
condition is that you will travel to 2 countries to sign your final
release documents and you will not be spending a dime from your
pocket.
send me your following details

Your Full Names.
Your Full Address.
Your Mobile Tel. No./Whats app Tel. No.
Your Occupation.
Valid Copy of Your International Passport.
Name of Your Nearest International Airport in Your City.

Kindly get back to me to my private email": optimistdavid73@aol.com

i will be attending to you there.

Have a great day ahead.

Best Regards
Mr.Optimist David

On 19/08/2021, optimist David <optimistclark123@gmail.com> wrote:
> send your details
>
> Thank you
>
> On 19/08/2021, gerard@asdfghjkl.ovh <gerard@asdfghjkl.ovh> wrote:
>> Hello,
>> how can I help you with this?
>>
>> Sincerely
>> Gerard
>>
>>

header.subject: Re: How can i help with this?
